start.welcome_back: Glad to see you back. What are you up to?
start.bot_description: Few words about SharedGoals service, to whom it may concern, how to make deal with it and so on

settings.pick_language: Pick language. Selected new language will apply to interface, but not goals, contracts etc.

contact.write_to_the_creator: 🤔 Here you can leave a message for the Creator. Be wise though, try to express your minds fully and clearly within one message.

shared.something_went_wrong: ❌ Something went wrong. Try one more time.

other.default_handler: 🚧 Hey, please choose a section with the Telegram keyboard before typing anything
